name: Taco Soda Shark
description:
This was created for Mini Jam 108: Seaside: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-108-seaside The theme was seaside . The limitation was that everything dies in one hit. So, if you get hit by a shark, you die, instant game over. After each round, the speed ramps up. Move up and down between rows with the W/S keys or the Up and Down keys.

Programming and art and concept by myself. I used additional assets for the music and sound effects. Music 3xBlast - WowMiauw - Fancy Cat; Sound Effects David Stearns Platformer SFX.  This was a lot of fun for my first jam. Hope you enjoy it!
